characterDescription:
Noura is a vizier in the Bronze Palace in Azir. Lift refers to her as "Fat Lips."
Via spanreed, Gawx tells Lift that the vizier misses her.
Noura thinks that by having left Thaylen City, that the Azish were protecting their fleet from the coming storm. However, Gawx - in his position as Prime Aqasix - tells her that they left because she was worried that Dalinar was being manipulated by the enemy.
Further, she believes that the thing that separates the Azish from the monarchies of the east - and the chaos they suffer - is that their emperor is held in check.
